author: bago
msg: 1. Created MailParametersHook: every parameter to MAIL must be handled by a MailParameterHook extension or the MailCmdHandler will fail.
2. Create a DataLineFilter extension point to hook on each line received during the DATA session.
3. Moved all the ESMTP-SIZE logic into a single component: MailSizeEsmtpExtension hook into all the extension points needed.
4. Added MAIL FROM: *AUTH* support (AuthCmdHandler implements MailParameterHook).
5. Moved all of the ESMTP-AUTH support to the esmtp package.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o turn the test on for a final run but we don't need the assembly again

author: jvanzyl
msg: o run the tests and make the default run-full-maven
